# Generated by iptables-save v1.8.4 on Sun Nov  1 00:17:41 2020
*filter
:INPUT ACCEPT [26327:13009946]
:FORWARD ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT ACCEPT [55060:4026217]
:LOGGING - [0:0]
-A INPUT -s 192.168.27.0/24 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 172.16.0.0/24 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.27.0/24 -p icmp -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 172.16.0.0/24 -p icmp -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.27.0/24 -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.27.0/24 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 53 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 172.16.0.0/24 -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 172.16.0.0/24 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 53 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 192.168.0.0/16 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -s 172.16.0.0/16 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT
-A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 22 -j LOGGING
-A LOGGING -j LOG --log-prefix "IPT-Filtered: "
-A LOGGING -j DROP
COMMIT
# Completed on Sun Nov  1 00:17:41 2020
